entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using Launcher in .NET MAUI to open a file opens the "share" menu on a Mac #14839
  • Error reading response from wcf service in basicHttpBinding #14836
  • cannot use developer tools to debug blazor hybrid MAUI application in Mac OS #14835
  • Picker SelectedItem set to null on Popup #14832
  • Maui Shell Not Animated Not Working in IOS #14831
  • DisplayActionSheet still not working on Windows #14829
  • [Bug] InputTransparent = false does not work. #14828
  • Webview CaptureAsync .net Maui Desktop #14825
  • Azure DevOps build failure: "The app references non-public selectors in Payload/AppDev.xxx.app/AppDev.xxx: setOrientation:animated: (ID: 701d936c-b52e-4dae-8823-bec4e8848c61)" #14823
  • Cannot debug on iOS as `Loaded Assembly xxxxx` phase takes too long. #14822

Closed

  • CollectionView does not update when changing ItemsLayout #7747
    Backlog
  • SearchHandler does not display more than one suggestion #6293
    Backlog
  • [Android] OnDestroy is currently firing twice #8541
    .NET 8 Planning
  • .NET MAUI on Android keeps not responding messages #14806

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] AOT profiles for .NET 8 Preview 4 #14838
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [android] MauiTextView doesn't need ViewAttachedToWindow #14833
    area/perf 🏎️, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [controls] improve performance of {Binding} #14830
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [net8.0] Merge latest main to net8 #14826
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview

Merged

  • [Windows] Update CollectionView changing ItemsLayout #14532
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Propagate Navigation Events through PageContainer #14523
  • Add some dummy images to the sandbox #14815
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix some sample XAML so the text wraps #14821
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Avoid OnDestroy lifecycle event firing twice #14799
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Make sure to call `InitializeViewHandler` when creating a handler #14814

Updated

  • [Essentials] add WiFi permissions on Android 13+ #14718
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Enabling tolerance adjustment in iOS color verification tests #13945
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView.RemainingItemsThresholdReached #14391
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Add the Platform* APIs for Graphics #14816
  • [Windows] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, do-not-merge, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Fix gestures in Label Spans #14410
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Android] Fix Entry issues with Keyboard using IsPassword #14382
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [iOS] Normalize the orientation from MediaPicker photos #14568
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Android] Fix issue in Entry Drawable using API Level 23 #14615
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Housekeeping] Added sample to the Gallery to validate shape invalidations clipping #14798
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Support both Update and Include for maui #14576
    area/setup 🪄
  • Loading images needs the screen scale #14807
  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
  • [iOS] Fix Label Truncation on iOS with HorizontalOptions #14453
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Platfrom/Android: fix toolbar text color #14800
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar
